Assign.origin: [the general practice by inventors of ing patent rights "J. K. Owens"]

1.definition: to transfer (property or rights) to another [the general practice by inventors ofpatent rights "J. K. Owens"]

2.definition: to appoint to a post or duty [to represent the defendant]

3.definition: to fix or specify in relationship or correspondence [no party may as error the giving or the failure to give an instruction unless that party objects thereto "Rule 51"]
